section.heading: Services between United States government and District government.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: District of Columbia administration, personnel management, reciprocal agreements for use of equipment, materials, facilities, and services, see § 1-628.01.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 1-204.22, § 1-207.34, § 1-207.39, and § 1-628.01.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: This section is set out above to correct an error appearing in the bound volume.
